Html: I've just installed VS2010 Pro Beta 2 and then tried to build the StockTraderRI solution in the CompositeApplicationGuidance-Feb2009.exe but I get build errors referring to System.XAML. Has anyone else been here and fixed this?

Hi Colin,

I have migrated Prism 2 to Visual Studio 2010 Beta 2 and fixed this and other issues while doing it. You can read more about it and download the migrated version in this post:

  • Prism 2 (Composite Application Guidance for WPF & Silverlight) migrated to Visual Studio 2010 Beta 2

Please let me know if this helps.
